Text: whats with the crap audio no play back on ps3...waste of time
No sound for me on PS3 or PC

If the specs are correct on this page, then the problem others are having could be due to the fact that some PS3s will not play an M2TS file that has a DTS audio track. Could be a firmware issue; I'm not sure, I stopped using the PS3 a long time ago. As far as PC users are concerned, just update your codecs, or download VLC player.
